ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] How many threads can I witness in one hour?
ygData.msgSnippet: Banded goes, on every server I ve played on, for between 6 and 7 pp a piece. Cheaper if you know the smith.  I ve seen them go as high as 10pp but that is
ygData.messageBody:
Banded goes, on every server I've played on, for between 6 and 7 pp a piece.
Cheaper if you know the smith. I've seen them go as high as 10pp but that
is pretty rare, even on the young servers.

Low price would be between 4 and 6pp. (yes, I've found it that cheap).

Remember: When doing trade skills your WISDOM keys your success rate. Low
Wis will HURT you. My rogue has a 109 int and an 83 wis (base, she's an
inkie) so she rarely fails ;) I'd say, at 17 tailoring skill, she fails
about 1 in 4 tries.

~ L
----- Original Message -----
From: "Webber, Jessica" <webber@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, March 31, 2000 2:07 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] How many threads can I witness in one hour?


> Nah, my bard is a tailor. By the time patchwork became trivial I was only
> failing half the time, making it about a break even skill. Made more
money
> fishing, which she still does since she's always forage fishing grubs.
>
> My rogue, also level 10, is just starting her tailoring skill. Doubt
she'll
> have any more luck money wise, but I hope to at least complete the set
she's
> wearing.
>
> Perhaps it's a server by server thing. How much do people want per piece
of
> banded on your server?
>
> Peace
> Evulia, bard of 10 verses
> Mead, rogue of 10 arrests
> & 4 other active characters
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
> > Sent: Friday, March 31, 2000 1:52 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] How many threads can I witness in one hour?
> >
> >
> > Hehe, my rogue on Tallon Zek (who I just made 2 nights ago)
> > is level 6,
> > completely un-twinked. Has full leather armor, a Giant Snake
> > Fang and is
> > starting to buy her banded already. What you're doing wrong
> > is not using
> > trade skills ;) Some of them are profitable even for NPC's
> > ;) I can make
> > almost 5 platinum an hour with my rogue ;) (at level 6
> > that's not bad at
> > all ;)
> >
> > Trade skills ;) Specifically: Tailoring ;)
> >
> > >
> > > So you're level 10, untwinked, and wearing BANDED??? What
> > am I doing
> > wrong?
> > > <sigh>
> > >
> > > Good job helping that other bard out. He must have been
> > twinked to get to
> > > level 10 playing only one song. Weaving's all that's kept
> > me alive many
> > > times over.
> > >
> > > Peace
> > > Evulia, bard of 10 verses, Tunare
> > > Adagia wrote:
> > > > obvious he was twinked. Here was this level 10 wood elf
> > bard, dressed
> > > > head to toe in bronze. I gave him the gauntlets, and he very
> > > > graciously
> > > > gave me his old bronze gauntlets. :) They look nice on
> > Adagia, but I
> > > > think they are too heavy, I'll probably just stick to
> > banded for now.
> >
> >
> >
